name: dsw
description: Dynamic Service Worker, offline Progressive Web Apps much easier

scripts.test: echo ':: Running tests:' && mocha tests/ --compilers js:babel-core/register
scripts.lint: echo ':: Linting the source files:' && eslint src/*
scripts.docs: echo ':: Generating documentation:' && docco -m -o docs/ docs/config-example.js
scripts.build: browserify src/main.js -o dsw.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && docs
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run build && echo Done' src
scripts.try: echo ':: Trying the sandbox sample:' && node index.js sandbox && http-server ./sandbox -p 8888

author: felipenmoura
